content.text:
4.2.7.1 DataRemovalMechansim (M) 
The DataRemovalMechanism table SHALL contain exactly one row with UID = 0x00 00 11 01 00 00 00 01. 
The DataRemovalMechanism table SHALL be supported (see Table 33). 
Table 33 - Admin SP – DataRemovalMechansim Table Preconfiguration

tables.title: Table 33 - Admin SP – DataRemovalMechansim Table Preconfiguration
